SummaryEnglish: When acerbic loner Haruka gets transported to another world with his class, he's not big on adventuring, but he wouldn't mind some cool magic of his own. Unfortunately, the magic powers are first-come-first-served, and by Haruka's turn, there's nothing good left to choose from. Now he'll have to take on this fantasy world the hard way, with a hodgepodge selection of bizarre skills...and with all the girls in class tagging along!
Aliases: Lonely Attack on the Different World

1.SummaryEnglish: Haruka is suddenly summoned to another world along with his classmates where special skills are first come, first served. He gets the skill "loner."

2.SummaryEnglish: Haruka overhears delinquents misusing their skills.

3.SummaryEnglish: Life together with rambunctious girls is a little awkward.

4.SummaryEnglish: Haruka encounters the jocks. They tell him how they've kept an eye on the delinquents and that someone has a terrifying OP skill called "Hijack."

5.SummaryEnglish: After arriving in the town of Omui, the group heads for the Adventurers Guild. Haruka, however, is not a high enough level.

6.SummaryEnglish: After saving Merielle, Haruka is paid a handsome sum and granted ID which allows him to freely leave town.

7.SummaryEnglish: Tanaka reveals his true evil side. It's all Haruka can do just to avoid getting hit, and things are starting to look bad.

8.SummaryEnglish: His classmates are adjusting well to their new lives as adventurers, but Haruka still wants to get back to his life alone in the woods.

9.SummaryEnglish: The last boss, the Dungeon Emperor, awaits Haruka in the deepest depths of the dungeon.

10.SummaryEnglish: While the duo Haruka and Angelica continue on their way out of the labyrinth and the rest of the class comes to meet them, the city is threatened with great disaster. The legendary raging horde called Stampede is on its way.

11.SummaryEnglish: After getting word about the stampede headed for town, Haruka makes haste in escaping the dungeon.

12.SummaryEnglish: The Class Rep is stunned to find a beautiful blond girl beneath Angelica’s armor. Haruka begins training with her.
